name: Sfshen.GitHub.io
body:
### welcome
This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. 


### Python program
* [Python Basics](https://github.com/sfshen/qfrm-python/blob/master/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)

### Python stuff
* [basic](http://localhost:8888/notebooks/Documents/github/qfrm-python/python-basics-notebook.ipynb)
* [secret (Project Euler)](http://localhost:8888/notebooks/Documents/github/qfrm-python/python-secret-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [interview practice](http://localhost:8888/notebooks/Documents/github/qfrm-python/python-interview-notebook-empty.ipynb)
* [Black-Scholes-Merton](http://localhost:8888/notebooks/Documents/github/qfrm-python/finance/python-black-scholes-merton.ipynb)


### About me
I am a new grad student at the University of Michigan, in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program. I did my undergraduate work in Nanjing University, majored in Financial Engineering. I have learned playing lute and painting for 12 years each, but only  painting became a real hobby. I have other hobbies like jogging, hiking and photography.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
